website_summaries.verdict: The OnePlus 6T is the most affordable, top-notch Android you can get. But if you already have the 6, don't feel the need to update.
pros: The OnePlus 6T offers top-notch hardware including a lightning-speed processor and an excellent camera for hundreds of dollars less than its competitors
For US customers, it works on Verizon's network
cons: The phone doesn't have a headphone jack or a water-resistant design
Its in-screen fingerprint reader should work a tad faster

website_summaries.verdict: The $549 OnePlus 6T is the best value for your Android smartphone dollar today.
cons: Camera doesn't quite lead the pack

customer_reviews.title: Clean OS . no spam pre loaded . a modern tool
customer_reviews.text: for the geeks : root friendly if that you want to do , clean os ie no preloaded facebook or other nasty . got to love the 8GB of ram make this phone a Beast with a dedicated GPU and 8 core CPU for the non geek: a safe and powerful cell capable of handling all modern need , less than half the cost of latest Iphone for 256GB of internal space and a 20MP camemera Thump up to OnePlus for taking the phone market head on !
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Blindingly quick
customer_reviews.text: Pure joy to use so fast my hair fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone failed after one day
customer_reviews.text: bought the phone, set everything up, transferred my data and after one day of use, the phone has apparently got a software issue where it is in a constant reboot and never loads. for a flagship phone this is appalling. This is my first one plus phone and i'm pretty certain i will never purchase one again. I have never had this type of issue with any other android device. quite clearly the testing is not thorough enough. very poor.
customer_reviews.author: northerly

customer_reviews.title: two year MANUFACTURERS WARRANTY NOT Valid purchased from Amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe having contacted one plus to be told that they do NOT support two year warranty if purchased through Amazon.This is a deliberately misleading description so be warned you will be charged as an "out of warranty" repair,as quoted by one plus.You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Bigal

customer_reviews.title: Speedy
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a replacement for my aging OnePlus 3. Very pleased with it so far, enough of an upgrade to make it worth while. Seems very responsive so far, starting and swapping apps is super quick. One nice touch I have l hadn't expected was a case included in the box. It's not the case I'd choose, but it's great to have it on day one and it'll do until I get the one I want.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. My new phone outperforms all of the competitor devices owned by my friends/colleagues. The camera is a massive improvement over the already decent camera on the OnePlus 5. The speed improvement from the new CPU is remarkable, especially when running multiple apps or games. Picture quality is amazing, when watching Amazon prime shows in HD on my phone, I often think they appear better quality than on my TV! Only concern after using the phone for a short time was I found the fingerprint sensor to be slightly temperamental which slowed down the unlock. However after more use, the sensor has seemed to "learn" more about my finger and the unlock is getting even quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great model, savvy purchase and amazing price point. Very very happy😊
customer_reviews.text: Was a little sceptical as I do intense research for devices in general. I wanted a handset that would both meet the cost effective element and also deliver a certain level of quality similar to most top of the range flagships. I wasn't disappointed when I received and started toying around with the OnePlus 6T. It delivers!! Fast, intuitive, responsive and interaction with apps is seamless. Great model, savvy purchase and amazing price point. Very very happy😊
customer_reviews.author: T-Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Best phone you'll find for less than £600
customer_reviews.text: This is without a shadow of a doubt the best value phone on the market today. Did a lot of research when looking to get a new phone after having the iPhone 6 all these years and this consistently came out on top. The screen is lush, and huge might I add, plus has nearly any 'notch' to it. There's a Snapdragon 845 in there with 8GB of RAM that push it so hard it rivals my MacBook Pro for speed And on top of all that it's less than £600. Can't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality fingerprint reader!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone was delivered on 7 November 18. It is a good phone and I like it. However, the fingerprint sensor is useless and takes far too long to unlock the phone. The camera is good but nowhere near as good as the huawei p 20 pro. I like that it is a dual sim phone, which was the main reason for purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Beat phone in this price range and one of the brst ever.
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing phone. In timrs where a great phine costs in regions of a £1000 OnePlus 6T gives you high quality phine that feels premium for half the cost of w flagship like Samsung or Pixel. You will miss out on wireless charging and a descent finger print reader (the on-screen one is not that good-hopefully something that can be fixed wirh a softesr update) and thr camrrea still struggles a bit also hopefuly sorted with software updates. Talking about software updates: Happens very often and address many issues mentioned by OnePlus community. To summarize it is the brst phone in its prcie rangr and one of the best phones of 2018
customer_reviews.author: Mr R

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast!
customer_reviews.text: Man I love this phone from its screen to its camera and the speed, won't bore you with the specs you can see them above coming from my one plus 3t this is a big upgrade and the dash (not now for legal reasons) charging is still one of the best around! the only thing I would criticise about the phone is it is slippy in the hand, but slap on a case or a skin and your sorted you would be hard pushed to find any phone of this quality and spec for the price. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: steveyk1980

customer_reviews.title: A terrible phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible phone - which is it's main reason for existing. Beyond that the finger print sensor is terrible, it cannot cast, it turns off when it feels like it, it misses all the smoothness of a more established Android phone and just does not work the way a top phone should. I bought this with high expectations and am disappointed every day and wish I had bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Hope I'm helpful

customer_reviews.title: The genuine thing.
customer_reviews.text: This oneplus 6T is exactly what is says it is. An amazing quality phone at an affordable price. No scams or second hand phones. I strongly advise this phone, especially to people on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran

customer_reviews.title: Semi-finished Product
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! But not quite what I expected... As a very satisfied user of OP 3 I though this will be my well-deserved upgrade. Boy, was I wrong! 1. This phone does not support call forwarding (and other related) I had it replaced thinking that it could be just my unit's fault, but my wife's and replacement phone had the same issue. This has been finally confirmed(after half of dozen factory resets and other basic "engineering") by OP support, that said "Unfortunately OP 6T do not offer calls forwarding". 2. Fingerprint reader is slower than my metabolism and I can't live with two simultaneous disappointments like that in my life
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Jazwiec

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone. Oneplus gets my vote
customer_reviews.text: Moved on from owning a Samsung. They are too expensive. This phone is amazing. The picture quality is breathtaking. Only had the phone for a few days so not sure on battery life. But so far I'm impressed. It comes with a screen protector and case in the box. Not sure if the big brands do that. Also has a 2 year warranty. So I've got no worries about this phone. As good as the big brands if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Reisoglu

customer_reviews.title: Best phone on the market!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first OnePlus phone. I love it. If you install the Google pixel camera app for the phone. The night sight oh my god. Is a great phone comes with 2 years warranty oled screen, 3700 battery. 1 full charge will last you at least a full day. Will recommend for everyone who is looking for a best Android on the market. Also big thanks to #OnePlus Peace out people!!! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Wai H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh battery, buggy software. Everything else is great
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is dissapointing given the size of the battery in the device but still good relatively to competitors. Software is where oneplsu are slipping a little. This phone has frozen far more than my previous one plus phones and at times would not reboot when a soft reboot was triggered. Eventually had to send it back into onplus, which is never a good experience. Lukily previous models didn't have as many issues. Sort the software one plus!
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for my aging Nexus 6P
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone but I was surprised that there was no notification LED. It seems we are expected to be constantly picking up our phones to check for missed messages/calls these days. I would have preferred the notification LED but have managed a few months without it just fine. I also got used to having no 3.5mm headphone jack and using the headphone to USB adapter. Overall I am very pleased with the phone and now that the Nexus range is dead and the Pixel range is priced so high I think I will be sticking with OnePlus for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: George Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Charging port failed twice
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about my Oneplus 6T until the charging port failed in March (16 months old) during lockdown & phone wouldn't charge. Bought another sim-free phone to get me through & yesterday (Oct-3rd) got round to having the charging port replaced: shown charging by repair guy, charged it fully at home. Today it won't charge: same problem, the cable won't go fully into the port. Sent it back to Oneplus as a warranty repair (which I should have done 1st time) & now fixed - will wait to see for how long before deciding if it's a 4*
customer_reviews.author: Richard P

customer_reviews.title: Dual SIm wonder
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone as I was getting fed up with carrying two about. Dual SIM and unlocked for this price was great. Anyone used to android will just get on with it, I was swapping from apple so it took a few days to get the hang of it. The battery life, well after Apple is amazing. the cameras are good and the quality is top class. storage is great and the processing speed is quick. switching between apps is quick and easy. This may not win individual awards from the tech press but as a practical phone that is good to use, easy to handle and does everything a smart should do. I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: ADGOW

customer_reviews.title: A phone that will definitely last you a couple of years.
customer_reviews.text: I consistently get 8+ hours of onscreen time at 85% brightness. This plus the smooth performance and great camera once you install the Google camera APK makes it a very compelling package. The mono speaker may not give you super spacious sound but it gets very loud (with decent richness) and you'll definitely hear it in all but the loudest places. The screen also presents very pleasant images and it's great that they give a choice or various colour profiles to suit your personal taste.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Liu

customer_reviews.title: Flagship phone without the flagship price
customer_reviews.text: Having decided to return to Android after two iPhones, chose this phone due to its high spec for a low cost and the fact it comes without too much bloatware. Am still being amazed by the phone as I continue to use it and feel like I made the right decision with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamietw

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone, so glad I left Apple behind.
customer_reviews.text: This phone feels like something fresh and new compared to the tired Apple form and OS. For the price point it destroys anything at a similar price and keeps ups with the flagships that are £300+ extra. The only minor gripe I have is that camera could be a little better in low light, even with the night mode enabled photos can still be a little grainy. But I suppose you can't expect everything to be flagship level at at £500 price point. Extremely happy with my purchase and would recommend OnePlus to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: A hell of a phone, upgraded from the Oneplus X to this and couldn't be happier, unboxing experience was great and comes with all the accessories you need. No need to go out and buy cables / chargers or adapters as it's all included here. Preinstalled screen protection and rubber casing also a plus here. Overall and for the quality/price I doubt there's anything out there that can beat this phone. You can also get the McLaren Edition for some extra goodies and performance and for a special edition the price is also very good. Highly recommended this phone from my part if you don't want to spend extra for a "named" brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I've been so pleased with this phone it came with a case also a screen cover fitted, the whole feel of the phone feels like quality and the software has some really nice touches I really can't fault it. The battery life is really good and seems to have got even better after a few days use. I've had this phone a few weeks now and I'm so pleased I bought it I even got the Bluetooth earphones to match
customer_reviews.author: Patsy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Near stock Android experience, well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone, great spec for the price, under screen finger print reader accurate and face unlock lightening fast. Screen is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: CEUOTC

customer_reviews.title: The battery is a BEAST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Samsung S7 Edge before which sadly got destroyed. I bought this and firstly loved the fact it was on sale on Amazon and then paid in 3 installments so was really light on the wallet. Everything is great on this phone but the BATTERY LIFE IS INSANE!! I use my phone heavily and even when I forget to charge it I never worry. It takes over 24-30hrs to drain the battery and with the super charger that comes with it, it just recharges so fast. I was down to 5% and then popped it on for 15 mins and it was enough to get me through a night out. Can't. Recommend. Enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dr A. Elmington

customer_reviews.title: Be warned
customer_reviews.text: After an update my phone became buggy. The fingerprint scanner would not work. Phone opened without any security. Chrome kept freezing flashing black screen. Gmail could not open emails. I called support was told to try a range of fixes. The last of which was to completely drain the battery and charge again. After trying this the phone will not charge at all. This awful advice has escalated an annoying situation to one where my phone is a "brick" and all my data will be lost. Dreadful service. Clearly not a competent phone company in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: TBB

customer_reviews.title: Affordable perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this phone so far. For me, it's the perfect phone: the speed and performance I want for work (multitasking email, calendar and docs) with a good camera and without breaking the bank. The OnePlus 6t comes with a screen protector pre-applied and a transparent case included -- everything you need is in the box. The software is easy to set up and fully customisable. Battery life is great: I can easily get through the day with power to spare and if I ever wouldn't, fast charging would get me back on track in 20min. The only small criticism I have is that in-screen fingerprint reader can sometimes be a bit slow to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Daan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone except for the fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon warehouse and it came with a generic charger not the fast charger so I returned it. I did buy it from another shop though. It is a very good phone but as you might expect the fingerprint reader isn’t very good as a thing you use for convenience, I tend to use the face unlock. Apart from the fingerprint reader the phone runs very well and over all I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Mellor

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf build at mid range price
customer_reviews.text: Impressive build quality. You'll find better screams on Samsung flagships etc but nothing you can really justify for a few extra hundreds of pounds. I went for the 6GB ram model and the snappiness is super impressive. If you're an avid mobile gamer then the 8GB model could be a form of future proofing - otherwise the 6GB will be more than enough for everyday use. For the cost, nothing can come close.
customer_reviews.author: Shane D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Galaxy S7 with battery issues. I thought about a Note 9, but at that price no. So I bought this as I had heard nice things about this phone, and so far it hasn't disappointed. In fact it has exceeded my expectations. Its much faster than the S7 and simpler to us. I am very pleased with it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: faulty
customer_reviews.text: i had this phone for just over a month now and it all of a sudden over heated and the screen went black and flashes white and blue now the phone is immaculate not a scratch on it the one plus gaurentee say they are going to sort it though so we will see about it
customer_reviews.author: luis i.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the Oneplus 3 to this whilst it was on deal and it is a lot better in every regard. I thought I'd miss the physical fingerprint reader although this one is good enough when using the included screen protector. If you change to a glass screen protector, it'll still work, although a bit more slowly. Camera is decent when Gcam is installed and Wi-Fi calling on BT in the UK is supported which is a big plus. Overall a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: chris l.

customer_reviews.title: Glass on the screen scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: The screen scratches easily and I haven't even had mine for THREE weeks and I got a scratch on it but besides that the phone is OK for the price especially since it has the Snapdragon 845 processor which is the same as most flagship Android phones costing upwards of £700 whilst this phone starts at £499 will try to get my phone replaced as I am digging the colour of the special edition version (it came out shortly after I got this) especially since it chargs faster than this If you get this just use a screen protector
customer_reviews.author: Mo S.

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good phone for a good price, look no further
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to pay dounle/triple the price of other phones. Look no further. The face recognition is great, as is the speed and screen quality. The in screen finger print scanner isnt great but works pretty well. It's not as good as buttons have been on previous phones, it's clearly 1st gen tech. That said, you'll probably use Face recognition 99% of the time, so wouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed
customer_reviews.text: (bought this on sale because my Pixel 1 was dying) This is a good phone. There's not too much bloatware pre-installed, and it's not locked in place, so you can remove the manufacturer versions and install your preferred app if you want. Fingerprint reader sometimes won't work if the phone is partway through the Screen Lock / Screen Dim / Screen Off cycle, and that's really the only complaint I can make.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Sea

customer_reviews.title: Screen brightness amd screen quality is poor.
customer_reviews.text: I think the software is fantastic and the features are Brilliant. The hardware (except screen) is fantastic at this price point. Sadly I had rotten luck and the device i ordered developed a screen fault as did its replacement. The screen would simply flicker and be dull even on mac brightness. I doubt even working ones would be bright enough in bright sun light as others have also mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Snappy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone very snappy, the software is just flawless, consider it a worthy upgrade from a phone which was around a year old. Apart from the camera not featuring a wide angle optic I would say the phone is probably the best out there on the market. I would like to add that it is worth loading the Google pixel camera on to the phone for better image quality
customer_reviews.author: Adz

customer_reviews.title: Over hyphed and over priced
customer_reviews.text: First and last time I am wasting money on a 'high end' Chinese phone. Camera average. It doe not connect to lap top via USB cable or through blue tooth despite following the complicated steps shown in you tube videos. Previous G6 plus was much simpler and better and much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: sak

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone outperforms my wife's S10, superb quality screen, finger print reader is very responsive, the speed it performs is unbelievable and the UI is way better than Samsung's.
customer_reviews.author: dc7911

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: For the money the oneplus 6t is unreal, you have super fast performance and a clean android feel. if you are after a phone that will keep up with your daily needs look no further you will be hard pushed to slow this phone down at all
customer_reviews.author: Mrsbsince09

customer_reviews.title: Nice ....
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Cracking phone, it really is. Had it for a while now and I'm still impressed with it. Excellent specs, fantastic performance and at a reasonable price - well, compared to other flagships. Plus there hardly any bloatware on it. Nice 1 Oneplus ;)
customer_reviews.author: Bronsi

customer_reviews.title: Negatives outweigh the pros
customer_reviews.text: Great battery, screen, speed and OS but has a few flaws. The fingerprint sensor is horrible a lot slower than any previous ones. Face id isn’t as good as apple and had a few bugs where my phone kept rebooting which is horrible when trying to work.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Overall worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried yet the face recognition, so I couldn't rate it. The phone it's not bad a part some software bugs but I think is worth the money. I'm used to be a Sony loyal customer and it required a bit to adapt myself to it. The phone was in perfect condition when it came. Happy with the seller service.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowLady

customer_reviews.title: You won't feel like you're buying second best. Because you're not.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I've had iPhones. I've had various Android phones including Samsung s8 and pixel 2xl. This is the best Android I've ever had. Nothing feels second best and the battery life is amazing. The screen is so bright and sharp. It feels like a quality product and feels like real value.
customer_reviews.author: John Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Good phone. Boxed already opened
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, although I seemed to get a used unit. Box was open and very dirty. Charging cable was stuffed in and things were open. Phone looked new. Maybe i received a return
customer_reviews.author: A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: A phone for the future.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant phone, very high quality and good all round phone. For me there was nothing I didn't like about the phone. Well designed and fast. Good quality photos. With a excellent memory.
customer_reviews.author: David earl

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: I love OnePlus, got this device since it came out and it's been wonderful. Battery lasts me 3 days and I'm a heavy phone user (10 HR SOT).
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I have Samsung s9+ and I buy oneplus for my girlfriend. The camera its little bit lower quality but the oxygen os it's what I like the usability it's amazing and the screen its very good ... charging it's so fast My girlfriend like them so much
customer_reviews.author: Big bro

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I don't swap phones regularly and I do my research before buying. This is my first OnePlus (after having a Google Nexus for years) and it's a great phone. Excellent specs and a great OS
customer_reviews.author: Sean Barry

customer_reviews.title: On the look out for a new phone. look no further.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a steal for the price. The operating software is top notch. I thought it might be a bit big, but I took a punt. My fears were unfounded. This phone is awesome. 8gb of ram 128gb of storage, great battery life. Well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Muhl

customer_reviews.title: Incredible phone
customer_reviews.text: OnePlus always make blazing fast phones and the 6T is no exception. For £499, this phone is incredible value compared to other companies such as Samsung and Apple who sell phones at £800+. I would defintely recommend for anyone looking for a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden P.

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value all-rounder.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone for the money. Excellent battery life, a good camera and buttery smooth user interface. Not the best camera but then a OnePlus is unlikely ever to be the best, just really good and at just over half the price of the latest iPhones and Samsung devices.
customer_reviews.author: RoyF

customer_reviews.title: Average Flagship Phone
customer_reviews.text: It is a good phone. However, upgrading from a OnePlus5 I struggled to notice many improvements. Sleek design, however not impressed with the battery life (which was worse than my 5). I have since returned it as I believe my phone had a defective battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for my mum. I have the OnePlus 5. Now I really want a OnePlus 6T.
customer_reviews.author: Stopher

customer_reviews.title: A real deal 🤝
customer_reviews.text: Amazzzzing phone. I was an apple user for a decade so very confuse to proceed with an android phone. But this is truly a wonderful phone with all features. The in display fingerprint sensor can be more accurate so the face recognition is. Other features are excellent. I definitely will recommend Oneplus for my friends
customer_reviews.author: ashokm

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Really quick, great screen. Good battery life. Replaced a OnePlus 3 (also a great phone), and massive improvement in speed and performance. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pilkington

customer_reviews.title: Great value good phone
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this phone. Works well. Dual SIM. Plenty of memory for apps. Good camera. Recent software update has noticeably improved fingerprint recognition. Excellent value. Buy a screen protector with the phone as getting one elsewhere later can be expensive
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Mobile bliss
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my Samsung J3 and the difference and ease of use is truly amazing. Fingerprint recognition is A1 (as long as you keep the fingerprint area free from smudge marks). This is so quick and powerful compared to the J3 that it is like comparing a Reliant Robin to a Mercedes. Highly delighted with the product 10/10
customer_reviews.author: David Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Features perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Both myself and my aunt love this phone superseeds other well known branded phone in my opinion even the fruit can be biten by this model with it size screen and memory. Steep price but you know it will last years if needed too.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Fab phone!, getting two days battery life! Good camera, but the app supplied with the phone does not support 16:9 aspect ratio, and too tedious to crop every picture to fit my monitor/TV. There are other camera apps available in play store that support 16:9. Also no panoramic view mode. Face recognition works really well and quick, so don't need entry code or fingerprint sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Slade

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back to any other phone
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal phone, really what can I say except that it out performs any other phone I've experienced. The face recognition is amazing and unlocks before you even have a chance to use the fingerprint scanner. The in screen scanner is brilliant as well, sometimes takes 2 or 3 tries to scan but overall it's an incredible phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kallb

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant phone but the only niggle for me is the power button is too soft to the touch so I'm constantly taking accidenal screen shots
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mapp

customer_reviews.title: Dubious
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for a few days now, it is fully charged but won't switch on. Perhaps a fault with the phone, Never had this problem with Samsung
customer_reviews.author: A. richards

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, top spec phone running stock android with lots of enhancements from the Oneplus people. Battery lasts days the way I use it. My only frustration is that the Thunder Purple did not get released with a 256gb storage option.
customer_reviews.author: Chris65

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Love this handset! Best I've owned. Lightning-speed response. Battery is excellent. Sound isn't great from the speaker, but I use earphones most of the time so doesn't really matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: P. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: best phone I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is just so good I cannot describe it! displays, processor battery life, attention to details with the software, everything just work so smoothly so goo, so well designed and thought full, aaaa, just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable but not the cheapest.
customer_reviews.text: My fourth OnePlus, I love these android phones, never let you down and they are updated frequently. Dash charging is super useful. No 5 stars since they are not getting any cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: So so pleased with this. Screen quality superb, super fast, battery life is nuts: I'm going three days between charges. It is large though, as in, it's a large screen - the thickness is standard.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: OnePlus ...it's the only One, to get!
customer_reviews.text: Been iPhone user for past 9 years and I absolutely don't regret making the switch. Probably the best you can get for your money out there. Really stable OS, great hardware spec and really top quality handset. It is pain that Apple Watch doesn't work with Android and transferring WhatsApp history seems impossible, but all in all really pleased and highly recommend OnePlus
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra Savant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colour, absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Brilliant speed and super quality pictures. User interface is easy and just simply the best phone for a good price. The only minor down side is the touch is a bit slow, need to press down on it a few times. I had an iPhone before, glad I moved over to android as I have the freedom to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Nasrine

customer_reviews.title: You get your money's worth
customer_reviews.text: After long research, I decided to buy the OnePlus 6T (previous a Huawei phone owner). The battery last for at least 2 days with average usage (Spotify, read news, check emails) and for 3 days with less activity than that. Internal memory is well above from what you expect from a phone, and the 6GB ram is cover all your needs. More than happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: outstanding phone
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best smartphone I've had in years. 256Gb storage, over 2 days of battery life, louder than normal speakers and stunning pictures. Cannot ask for more
customer_reviews.author: UK

customer_reviews.title: The beast - doesn't need to be expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Upgraded from the 3t, well happy. Wish headphones came with the 256gb phone... Since they've taken away the headphone jack and left a USB c converter...
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H

customer_reviews.title: Runs like a dream, its so fast.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from an S6 and my word was it well worth it, none of that samsung crap is installed, its just plain and clean. Best phone I've ever had. Plays and game you throw at it, its specs are insane.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great phone let down a little by the camera
customer_reviews.text: These are great phones, a lot of phone for not a lot of money, however the camera is a little disappointing. Picture quality is good when you can take a photo! These are very slow, when trying to take a picture of something that isn't perfectly still it's difficult to get an actual photo. If taking photo's isn't to important to you using a phone this is a great phone
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Wakeling

customer_reviews.title: Fast smartphone
customer_reviews.text: I was put on to this phone by a family member, it is fast reliable and easy to use. With other phones I had difficulty connecting to wifi in large stadiums with this phone there is no loss of speed or connection. So far I haven't had any problems with any of the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M H Russell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful device
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as it was finally time to upgrade from my old S7 Edge, and all I can say is that this is a beautiful phone. The fingerprint reader is definitely lagging, and it has its issues with apps randomly crashing sometimes but for the most part this phone is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Alin

customer_reviews.title: No phone in box
customer_reviews.text: No phone in box. Box opened and repackaged. Phone missing. Update replacement phone received unopened. Highly recommended super fast phone you will not be disappointed. Fingerprint reader works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sagz

customer_reviews.title: Best price/performance phone
customer_reviews.text: Totaly love oneplus phones! Great price/performance value. Great build quility,fastest charging phone i ever had. And this thunderpink color is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Stasys Rusys

customer_reviews.title: A first class product
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money - works right out the box no problems smooth display fast performance exceptional quality - deserves top marks on every aspect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute monster
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone back in January 2019, absolute monster of a phone. Incredibly quick in every aspect and the warp charge taking ~45 mins from 0-100% is great to have and on top of that a very good battery that lasts me ~2 days on a full charge on an average day, with extended use around just over 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone for the money, fingerprint unlock is fast but slightly slower than more traditional fingerprint readers, great screen, great battery life top notch performance, for this price its hard to beat
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't regret this bargain
customer_reviews.text: Best smartphone I've ever owned and at such a reasonable price. The charging speed is phenomenal and other than the lack of wireless charging, this is an amazing phone. It is very big though (same size in hand as iPhone XS Max)
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel leeder

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great for the price! I have the 8gb version and it is very fast and snappy. The battery life is also great and last ages! The fingerprint scanner is perfect almost every tine, but for almost the first if its kind it is great. The screen is huge and looks amazing, this is a great buy and I recommend you to buy this phone if your budget is around £500.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is insane!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome. The battery lasts forever. I usually just charge to 80% to avoid battery wear. I can do that in 15 minutes once or twice a day rather than charge overnight. Loving the OS. I came from a Google Nexus phone and was a bit afraid of Oxygen OS. But it is even better than stock android at this point. Highly recommended phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase a another OnePlus product
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months of light use, phone keeps crashing, fingerprint reader next to useless, camera poor
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Russell

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: So I don't know much but I wish I had the phone haha, very well done. Incredible battery life
customer_reviews.author: Adam Oz

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone for tech lovers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Xmas. He's very tech savvy and this is perfect for him. He loves the functionality, the screen is excellent for gaming and he says its the best phone he's ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda, Norwich

customer_reviews.title: A very good and very fast Android Phone.
customer_reviews.text: It's a OnePlus - what is there to dislike. Simply one of the best Android phones you can get with your hard earned cash. This device proves you don't need to spend £1000 on a flagship phone to get the quality and specifications you need.
customer_reviews.author: Potz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tech!
customer_reviews.text: If this is an example of how phones have changed in 5 years I should have changed mine before now! This is worth every penny and I am yet to find anything I would change on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr David Howells

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing battery life, supper fast, great screen size. The best phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Emhack

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant. Can't do better for the price.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars, enough said. There were a couple of minor bugs in the OS at the start but, thanks to the regular updates, they are all gone.
customer_reviews.author: JonBoy

customer_reviews.title: A great phone but...
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly for 2 weeks, then the cameras stopped working. Forums show it is quite a common fault, no resetting etc could resolve it so i have returned it. One+ customer service (which were excellent) suggested a repair, but would take weeks. Genuinely a great phone though expect for the obvious major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son's graduation gift.
customer_reviews.text: My son said that this phone beats most of the popular brands on the market. He loves the super quick processer and charging speeds. The specifications of the phone leave a lot of phones standing, and for less of a price tag too.
customer_reviews.author: sophie777

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint reader and face recognition faulty
customer_reviews.text: My device doesn't pick up my face at all and the same as my finger prints, would suggest in an different model if this is a requirement
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device long battery life , fast and stable system
customer_reviews.author: nasser

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for a couple of months now. Easy to use with great battery life. Good quality sound and images, a bargain at the price I paid during black Friday.
customer_reviews.author: monkeypastel

customer_reviews.title: Just the right thing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this phone for 3 months now and it serves me as well and even better than some of those big name brands with outrageous prices. Already my best phone ever all round. Hopefully OnePlus doesn't follow other brands to hike it's prices in the future.
customer_reviews.author: 'Abinye

product_meta.title: OnePlus 6T 8 GB RAM 128 GB UK SIM-Free Smartphone - Mirror Black (2 Year Manufacturer Warranty)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:128 GB| Style Name:8 GB| Colour Name:Mirror BlackQualcomm Snapdragon 845，In-display Fingerprint Sensor, Hall, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Proximity, RGB Ambient Light Sensor, Electronic Compass, Sensor Core; Dual nano-SIM slot,3700 mAh (non-removable),Fast Charging (5V 4A),2340 x 1080 pixels 402ppi,6.41 inches. Comes with 2 year manufacturer warranty. Occasional fingerprint scanning failure: If your phone's screen fingerprint recognition rate is low or unrecognized, try the following methods to exclude: Is a third-party protective film used on the screen? Third-party protective film is not officially certified and cannot guarantee performance. It may decrease fingerprint recognition rate and is not recommended. Whether there is dirt in the fingerprint recognition area, bubbles or dust in the protective film. Whether the protective film/cover glass of the fingerprint area is scratched or cracked. If so, please try to re-input your fingerprint or replace the protective film/screen. After the new applied/replacement/removal of the protective film, the fingerprint needs to be re-input, otherwise the fingerprint recognition success rate will be affected. If unlock the phone under strong light environment, need to completely cover the recognition area with your finger. If under low temperature (-5 degrees) environment recognition success rate is low; try to use the fingerprint at room temperature. Warm tips: due to the influence of environmental factors such as temperature or light, the recognition rate may decline. It is suggested to turn on the face unlocking function to assist unlocking.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x OnePlus 6T
Screen Protector (pre-applied)
Case
Dash Type-C Cable
Dash Power Adapter
SIM Tray Ejector
Quick Start Guide
Safety Information
Type-C to 3.5 mm Headphone Jack Adapter
feature_bullets: Display Type: 6.41-inch Optic AMOLED, 2340 x 1080 resolution, 402 pixels per inch, 19.5:9 aspect ratio
Camera resolution: 20 megapixel dual main camera and 16 megapixel front camera
Memory capacity: 128 GB of internal memory; Memory: 8 GB of RAM
Fast charge – a day’s power in half an hour
SIM card & operating system: Sim card type: Dual nano-SIM, Operating system: Oxygen OS based on Android 9.0 Pie

Scope of delivery: OnePlus 6T, Screen Protector (pre-applied), Translucent Phone case, USB Type-C to 3.5mm Adapter, OnePlus Fast Charge Type C cable, OnePlus Fast Charge Power Adapter, SIM Tray Ejector, Quick Start guide, Safety information
